name: Gold Trans Am
content: Get inside my forking gold trans am
Get inside my forking gold trans am
Pull over sucker  now spread em
把车靠边停，将它们展开
让我看看布里放着什么
像救护车一样拦截交通
Tryna让我把手伸进你的裤子
I'm the captain of this ship
So shut up and get inside
Come on  climb into my golden cockpit
爱你直到你看见星条旗
Burning rubber on the southern highway
南方高速上橡胶在燃烧
Gonna take you for a freedom ride
Get inside my forking gold trans am
Get inside my forking gold trans am
Your sweet a** mullet caught my eye
你的翘臀让我眼前一亮
Twenty bucks and a switchblade knife
二十块和一把锋利的刀
American metal with a devil inside
Daisy dukes showing off my a**
富家子弟拼命地炫耀着
我走过的时候给他们一顿鞭子
I'm the captain of this ship
So shut up and get inside
Come on  climb into my golden cockpit
爱你直到你看见星条旗帜
Burning rubber on the southern highway
南方高速上橡胶在燃烧
Gonna take you for a freedom ride
